replies.body: On the AXS website, it says that the price is 160-355 kr. Will that get changed to what you have promised?
It also states that there are additional fees if you read it thoroughly (plus applicable fees).

What will be the schedule for the event? What happens at the Saturday and what happens at Sunday, and is the ticket, price 320, for both days or for one each? So much pepp you don't even understand :D :D {{champion:2}}
Tickets prices are per day. Saturday 3v4 and Sunday 1v2.
What do you mean by 3v4 and 1v2?
3rd place v 4th place and 1st place v 2nd, not that difficult :D
When they say the NA Summer finals  will be announced will the tickets be on sale or are they just announcing the selling date?
[The announcement](http://na.lolesports.com/articles/na-summer-finals-tickets) confirms when NA Summer Finals tickets go on sale. Save the date for June 17 at 12pm EDT/9am PDT.
